definitions.body: :Pr 15:6 wealth, treasure (on relation to √ mng. cf. [[חַיִל]])—´[[ח]] abs. Pr 15:6 + 2 t.; cstr. Is 33:6, Je 20:5; —wealth, treasure, of individuals Pr 15:6 ([[רַב]] ´[[ח]], opp. [[נֶעְכָָּרֶת]]), Pr 27:24 (‖[[נֵזֶר]]), Ez Eze 22:25 (‖[[יְקָר]]); of city [[הָעִיר הַזּאׁת]] ´[[ח]] Je 20:5 (‖[[יְגִיעַ]], [[יְקׇר]], [[אוֹחָרוֹת]]); in transf. sense [[יְשׁוּעׂת]] ´[[ח]], wealth (or abundance VB) of salvations, [[הִיא אוֹחָרוֹ]] ´[[חָכְמַת וׇדָָעַת יִרְאַת י]] ´[[יְשׁ]] ´[[ח]] Is 33:6 and stability of thy times shall be abundance of salvations (help, deliverances), etc.
